benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Parry
effects: If you're holding a Finesse weapon and another creature hits you with a melee attack, you can take a Reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus to your Armor Class, potentially causing the attack to miss you. You gain this bonus to your AC against melee attacks until the start of your next turn.
